org.pepstock.charba.client.events

Class AbstractEvent<H extends com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.web.bindery.event.shared.Event<H>
      • com.google.gwt.event.shared.GwtEvent<H>
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.events.AbstractEvent<H>
  • Type Parameters:
    H - GWT event object
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimationCompleteEvent, AnimationProgressEvent, ChartClickEvent, ChartHoverEvent, ChartResizeEvent, DatasetSelectionEvent, LegendClickEvent, LegendHoverEvent

    public abstract class AbstractEvent<H extends com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler>
extends com.google.gwt.event.shared.GwtEvent<H>
    Abstract event for all events which must contain a native event.
    This event contains the chart instance as source.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
